title: copy of Parameter converts it to Variable
body_html:
In [27]: l = nn.Linear(10,1)

In [28]: s = l.state_dict()

In [29]: s2 = copy.deepcopy(s)

In [32]: s
Out[32]:
OrderedDict([('bias', Parameter containing:
              -0.1027
              [torch.FloatTensor of size 1]), ('weight', Parameter containing:
               0.1287  0.2447  0.0268  0.1237  0.2291 -0.2262  0.2658 -0.1941 -0.2136  0.0907
              [torch.FloatTensor of size 1x10])])
In [36]: s2
Out[36]:
OrderedDict([('bias', Variable containing:
              -0.1027
              [torch.FloatTensor of size 1]), ('weight', Variable containing:
               0.1287  0.2447  0.0268  0.1237  0.2291 -0.2262  0.2658 -0.1941 -0.2136  0.0907
              [torch.FloatTensor of size 1x10])])

body:
```
In [27]: l = nn.Linear(10,1)

In [28]: s = l.state_dict()

In [29]: s2 = copy.deepcopy(s)

In [32]: s
Out[32]:
OrderedDict([('bias', Parameter containing:
              -0.1027
              [torch.FloatTensor of size 1]), ('weight', Parameter containing:
               0.1287  0.2447  0.0268  0.1237  0.2291 -0.2262  0.2658 -0.1941 -0.2136  0.0907
              [torch.FloatTensor of size 1x10])])
In [36]: s2
Out[36]:
OrderedDict([('bias', Variable containing:
              -0.1027
              [torch.FloatTensor of size 1]), ('weight', Variable containing:
               0.1287  0.2447  0.0268  0.1237  0.2291 -0.2262  0.2658 -0.1941 -0.2136  0.0907
              [torch.FloatTensor of size 1x10])])
```
